std::vector< observable * > obs_v
std::vector< evalable * > eva_v

Detailed Description

Basic measurements class.

The interface to add and access measurements and observables is controlled from this class.

Member Function Documentation

void measurements::add_observable ( std::string  name  ) 

Adds scalar observable.

Adds a new observable with certain name and default bin length

Adds scalar observable.

Adds a new observable with name and specific bin length.

void measurements::add_observable ( std::string  name,
luint  bin_length,
luint  initial_length 
)

Adds scalar observable.

Adds a new observable with name, specific bin length and a ppredefined standard length. Now resizing of arrays needed if you now the length in advance.
